# isInStation

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the transit pass has tapped in at a station and has not tapped out.

## Declaration

```swift
var isInStation: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Transit networks that have tap-in and tap-out ride accounting use this value. Wallet may display this status as “en-route” in its user interface.

## Getting pass status

- **expirationDate**: The date that the transit card expires.
- **isBlocked**: A Boolean value that indicates the pass issuer disabled the pass.
- **isBlacklisted**: A Boolean value that indicates the transit pass issuer disabled the pass.
